data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Balkh, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Balkh, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Balkh, Afghanistan and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Balkh, Afghanistan to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 240 believers in Balkh to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab, Tajiki people.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Balkh.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Balkh, Afghanistan that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Balkh, Afghanistan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Balkh
location.cities_list: Mazār-e Sharīf, Balkh, Khulm, Qarchī Gak, Lab-Sar
location.cities_list_w_pop: Mazār-e Sharīf (303,282), Balkh (114,883), Khulm (64,933), Qarchī Gak (8,942), Lab-Sar (1,068)
